info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 4:30PM MDT until August 10 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Junction has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Mesa County in west central Colorado... Southeastern Grand County in east central Utah... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 430 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 20 miles east of Castle Valley, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of western Mesa and southeastern Grand Counties, including the following locations... Gateway. This includes Colorado 141 between mile markers 105 and 115. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
